mapper.select: SELECT newsNo, title, originLink, hitCount, categoryNo, tagNo FROM NEWS
mapper.update: UPDATE NEWS SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE newsNo = #{newsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM NEWSREPLY nr JOIN NEWS n ON n.newsNo = nr.newsNo WHERE nr.newsNo = #{newsNo}

SELECT nr.replyNo, content, regDate, newsNo, nr.memberNo, nickName, NVL(likeCount,0) likeCount, NVL(userReplyLiked,0) userReplyLiked, profile FROM newsReply nr JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = nr.memberNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNo, COUNT(*) likeCount FROM newsReplyLike GROUP BY replyNo ) nrl ON nr.replyNo = nrl.replyNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNo, COUNT(*) userReplyLiked FROM newsReplyLike nrlRe JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = nrlRe.memberNo WHERE m.memberNo = #{memberNo} GROUP BY replyNo ) nrl2 ON nr.replyNo = nrl2.replyNo WHERE newsNo = #{newsNo} ORDER BY replyNo OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO newsReply(replyNo, content, regDate, newsNo, memberNo) VALUES(replyno_seq.NEXTVAL, #{content}, sysdate, #{newsNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM newsReply WHERE replyNo = #{replyNo} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE newsReply SET showHide = -1 WHERE replyNo=#{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO complain(complainNo, memberNo, complain, complainDate, replyNo) VALUES(complainNo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{complain}, sysdate, #{replyNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM newsReplyLike WHERE replyNo = #{replyNo} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
